content.text: Hi! I'm a big fan of Harry Potter books!
Oh that's awesome! I love Harry Potter too!  I have all the books and watched all the movies.
Me too! I've read them all multiple times. I'm actually wearing a Harry Potter shirt today!
That's awesome! I have a few Harry Potter t-shirts as well. I even have a Harry Potter scarf!
That's so cool! I need to get a scarf!
You should! They're really warm and comfortable.
What's your favorite Harry Potter book?
That's a tough question! I think I'd have to say the Prisoner of Azkaban. It's so suspenseful and exciting.
That's one of my favorites too! I love the time travel aspect of it.
Me too! It's so interesting to see how the past affects the future.
What's your favorite Harry Potter character?
That's another tough question! I think I'd have to say Hermione. She's so smart and brave.
She's my favorite too! She's such a good friend and role model.
She is! I love her loyalty and intelligence.
Me too! She's a great character.
She is! I'm so glad we're both Harry Potter fans!
Me too! It's my favorite series.
Mine too! We should talk more about Harry Potter sometime!
